name: emi.arc-infosys
description:
The ARC middleware implements a scalable, production quality dynamic distributed information system.

The ARC information system has been deployed and being used in a large scale production environment since

May 2002. As of writing, the information system aggregates 70 resources providing Globus ToolkitTM40

thousand CPUs and serves Globus ToolkitTM400 thousand jobs per month.
releaseNotes:
What's new:



    * High priority bugs fixed:

          o 2595 - totalcpus in [queue/*] section is ignored

          o 2443 - The client doesn't see the status of the job if hostname contains uppercase letters 

    * Medium priority bugs fixed:

          o 802 - review the content of the nordugrid-arc-doc package for 0.8

          o 2037 - infosys non-responsive on high-load 

    * Less priority bugs fixed:

          o 2642 - Banning DNs, and the infosystem 



Deployment notes:



    * This release does not introduce any changes in the deployment procedures described in ARC Infosys documentation 



Known Issues



    * Documentation improvements are still needed.
